Software development experience, particularly with Python.

Excellent written and interpersonal communication skills, along with a willingness to uphold Ebury's values.

Familiarity with AWS and/or Google Cloud, and Linux administration is a plus.
Knowledge of Spanish or Portuguese is a bonus.

Staff Data Engineer
So Paulo Office - Hybrid: 4 days in the office, 1 day working from home
Join Our Data Team at Ebury So Paulo Office.
Eburys strategic growth plan would not be possible without our Data team and we are seeking a Data Engineer to join our Data Engineering team!Our data mission is to develop and maintain Eburys Data Platform and serve it to the whole company, where Data Scientists, Data Engineers, Analytics Engineers and Data Analysts work collaboratively.
As a Staff Data Engineer, you will work closely with the rest of the team to help model and maintain the Data Platform.
What we offer:

Competitive salary and benefits package 
Discretionary bonus based on performance
Continued personal development through training and certification
We are Open Source friendly, following Open Source principles in our internal projects and encouraging contributions to external projects

Mentor other engineers within the domain, unblocking their delivery through technical support and contributing to a positive team culture.  

About you:

Proficiency in Python for data transformation and validation
Proficiency in SQL for querying and managing large datasets, as well as extensive experience working with structured and unstructured data sources.
Deep expertise in data engineering and modelling skills such as slowly changing dimensions and dimensional modelling.
Graph database modelling encouraged.
Event driven architecture data modelling encouraged.
Extensive, hands-on experience with data warehousing, data lakes, and cloud platforms, including leading the architectural design and strategic implementation of data solutions at scale.
Demonstrated ability to technically lead large-scale projects, align senior stakeholders on technical strategy, and present complex proposals to leadership.
Proven track record of mentoring engineers and setting technical standards within a team.
Deep experience with GCP (Google Cloud Platform) tools and services, such as BigQuery, Cloud Run, and Cloud Functions.
Self-motivation and curiosity, with a desire to learn and grow in a fast-paced environment, continuously improving both technical and business skills.
Fluency in English (Spanish, a plus).

Office management

Managing the primary inbound communication channels and correspondence, including phone calls, mailboxes and physical packages, meal vouchers etc.

Assist in the effective running of facilities contract services, including building maintenance, purchasing, post room, security, cleaning, waste management, stationery, plants, coffee machine, pest control, environmental and building consultancy services, and new suppliers..
General office management duties including meeting room management and conference call facilitation, hot desk administration, supplies and stock management of office supplies, business card administration, company merchandise, monthly office social events, courier bookings, car fleet etc.
Moves and project coordination.
Manage the landlord relationship.
Organise parties and after-work events, and prepare a monthly newsletter.
Collaborate in supporting Marketing events.




Health & Safety

Assist in the duty of care, health and safety programs with comprehensive policies and practices for the office and home-based workers.
Assist/coordinate relevant Health & Safety with all staff as necessary.




Employee Engagement

Lead the planning and coordination of monthly employee engagement activities, including summer events, Christmas celebrations, and team-building initiatives.
Collaborate with internal groups such as the ESG team and Womens Network to support and execute charity drives, donation campaigns, and employee sports clubs to foster a positive and inclusive workplace culture.
